title: E-commerce Redesign
description: Complete redesign of a major e-commerce platform to improve user experience and increase conversion rates.
challenge: Users were abandoning their shopping carts at a 70% rate, and the overall user experience was confusing and outdated.
solution: Conducted extensive user research, created new user flows, and designed a modern, intuitive interface with improved checkout process.
outcome: Reduced cart abandonment by 45% and increased overall conversion rate by 32%. User satisfaction scores improved from 2.1 to 4.6 out of 5.

phases.name: Research & Discovery
phases.description: User interviews, competitive analysis, and analytics review

phases.name: Design & Prototyping
phases.description: Wireframing, visual design, and interactive prototypes

title: Mobile Banking App
description: Design of a new mobile banking application focused on simplicity and security.
challenge: Customers found existing mobile banking options complex and were concerned about security.
solution: Designed a clean, intuitive interface with biometric authentication and simplified transaction flows.
outcome: App achieved 4.8-star rating in app stores and 89% user adoption rate within first 6 months.

phases.name: User Research
phases.description: Conducted interviews with 50+ banking customers to understand pain points

phases.name: Security Analysis
phases.description: Worked with security team to design secure yet user-friendly authentication

phases.name: Design & Testing
phases.description: Created and tested multiple design iterations with users
